attributes.text:
This widget displays a menu. A dialog menu extends a dialog and contains a list, which provides the user the possibility to select one value. The selected value is identified through selected index.

Example


var model = new qx.data.Array(["item1","item2","item3"]);

var menu = new qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Menu(model);
menu.show();
menu.addListener("changeSelection", function(evt){
   var selectedIndex = evt.getData().index;
   var selectedItem = evt.getData().item;
}, this);

This example creates a menu with several choosable items.
, the model which contains the choosable items of the menu.
The anchor widget for this item. If no anchor is available, the menu will be displayed modal and centered on screen.
Fired when the selection is changed.
Reacts on blocker tap.
Event handler for tap on clear button.
, contains the selected index number.
Hides the menu, fires an event which contains index and data.
Reacts on selection list click.
new value of the property
previous value of the property (null if it was not yet set).

Applies changes of the property value of the property clearButtonLabel.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #clearButtonLabel}.
new value of the property
previous value of the property (null if it was not yet set).

Applies changes of the property value of the property nullable.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #nullable}.
Creates the selection list. Override this to customize the widget.
The selection list
Triggers (re-)rendering of menu items.

Initial value for property clearButtonLabel.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property clearButtonLabel with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #clearButtonLabel}.

The label of the null value entry of the list. Only relevant when nullable property is set to true.
Indicates whether the menu should disappear when tap/click on blocker.

Class which is assigned to unselected items. Useful for re-styling your menu via LESS.
